attributes.action: Bring in Inflation Rises on All Fines each Year to Stop them getting Low as Now.
attributes.additional_details: Many Fines in the Media are just plain stupid and lagging behind as seen, let’s try to get things corrected if they are not will get further down the line of just plain Stupid and No Penalty.
attributes.background: Many Fines have fallen so far behind that they are Useless and just Pocket Money, this makes them a lacking any Punishment and Silly, this would or should keep them in line with Wages and Salaries, a number need Raising now to bring them up to date and a Punishment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly which fines you would like to be increased in line with inflation. 

The Government is only responsible for fines issued by the Government, and is not responsible for other fines - for example, fines set by local councils or private organisations.
